full_summary:
================={{
### Electric Vehicle Battery Value Chain
#### Tender Notice

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030703
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** ISED206687
**Publication Date:** March 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 28, 2023, 14:00
**Amendment Date:** April 20, 2023
**Contract Status:** Expired

### Tender Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Industry Canada
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and 8 other agreements

### Description of the Work
A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued for the electric vehicle battery value chain. The proposals will be evaluated on the basis of technical proposals, financial proposals, and partnerships, among other criteria.

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Jordan Kearns
- **Email:** Jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca
- **Phone:** (343) 548-6416

### Supporting Documents
- The tender documents can be found at [Canada Buys (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/)
- Attachments include: RFP ISED206687 - EV Battery Value Chain, RFP ISED206687 - Questions 1-4, RFP ISED206687 - Questions 5-8, and RFP ISED206687 - Question 9

### Important Details
* The tender is open to all interested parties regardless of nationality or location of the manufacturer.
* Government of Canada policies and procedures will govern the administration of this procurement.
* Late proposals or proposals that do not meet the requirements specified in the RFP will not be accepted.

### Additional Information
Please refer to the RFP for further information on the requirements, evaluation criteria, and any other details.
 }}
